//Keyboard address in chars
00010101000101010100000000000100010000010100010000000000000101010000000001000001







00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 //Preamble
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 //5 byte address
00 01 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 //PCF len: 22, pid: 0x01, don't disable auto ack
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //pay 0
01 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 
00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 
00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 
01 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 
01 01 00 01 00 00 01 00 
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 
01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 
00 00 01 00 01 01 00 01 
01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01
00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 //pay 10 
01 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 
00 01 00 00 01 00 01 00 
01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //pay 20
00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 //pay 21
00 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 //crc0
01 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 //crc1

//Following 264 byte consume about 132us time (fits the ramp up time of 130us needed to switch between rx/tx when ack should be send)
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 

//likely an ack:
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01  //Preamble

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //len: 0, pid: 0

//tx followed by rx with ack payload
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01
00 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 //len: 5, pid: 2, don't disable ack
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //0
00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 //1
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //2
00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 //3
01 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 //4
01 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 //CRC1
01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 //CRC2

00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01

----------------------------------------------------
Ack payload with LED state CAPSLOCK
---------------------------------------------

//One more with ack
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 
00 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 //len 5, pid 2
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //0: 0x00 <- logitech Dev ID
00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 //1: 0x40 <- report type
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //2: 0x00
00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 //3: 0x14
01 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 //4: 0xac <- logitech checksum
01 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 //crc1
01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 //crc2

//ramp up time garbage (264 bytes, 132 us)
00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 

00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 
00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 //len 10, pid: 0
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //0: 0x00 <- logitech Dev ID
00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 //1: 0x0e <- report type keyboard LED downstream (see https://lekensteyn.nl/files/logitech/Unifying_receiver_DJ_collection_specification_draft.pdf number 2.3.7)
00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 //2: 0x03
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //3: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //4: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //5: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //6: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //7: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //8: 0x00
01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 //9: 0xef <- logitech checksum
01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 //CRC1: 0xef
00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 //CRC2: 0x30


-------------------------------------------------
ACK PAYLOAD without CAPS LOCK
-------------------------------------------------

00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 
00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 //len: 5, pid: 0
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //0: 0x00 <- logitech Dev ID
00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 //1: 0x40 <- report type
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //2: 0x00
00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 //3: 0x14
01 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 //4: 0xac <- logitech checksum
01 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 //CRC1 0xda
00 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 //CRC2 0x1a

00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 


00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 
00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 
00 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 //len: 10, pid: 2 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //0: 0x00 <- logitech Dev ID
00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 //1: 0x0e <- report type keyboard LED downstream (see https://lekensteyn.nl/files/logitech/Unifying_receiver_DJ_collection_specification_draft.pdf number 2.3.7)
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 //2: 0x01
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //3: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //4: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //5: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //6: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //7: 0x00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 //8: 0x00
01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 //9: 0xf1 <- logitech checksum
01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 //CRC1: 0xC2
00 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 //CRC2: 0x2e

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 00 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 01 01 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 01 01 00 00 01 01
